text: Nevermore () is a 1962 Soviet drama film directed by Vladimir Dyachenko and Pyotr Todorovsky.Расписание неделиКульт и его личностиАрхивное кино, которое интересней современного«Московская премьера 2013»: Программа == Plot == At the shipyard the director was changed. The new director turned out to be an extremely cruel person.Никогда == Cast == * Yevgeny Yevstigneyev as Alexander Aleksin, new director shipyard * Pyotr Gorin as Fyodor Shanko * Ninel Myshkova as Irina, wife Aleksin * Evgeniy Grigorev as Garpischenko * Stanislav Khitrov as Melnitsky * E. Lavrovsky as Dolina * Leonid Parkhomenko as Shcherbak (as L. Parkhomenko) * Mariya Lvova as Inna (as M. Lvova) * Valentina Vladimirova as Masha (as V. Vladimirova) * Valeriy Nosik as Nitochkin (as V. Nosik)Никогда (1962) Full Cast & Crew == References == == External links == * Category:1962 films Category:Russian-language films Category:Soviet drama films Category:Soviet films
title: Nevermore (1962 film)
